LanguageData.Kevlar.label: kevlar
LanguageData.Kevlar.description: Poly-para-phenylene terephthalamide fibers woven into a tough mat to make the super-strong, super-stiff finished material we know as Kevlar.
LanguageData.Kevlar_Fibers.label: kevlar fibers
LanguageData.Kevlar_Fibers.description: Raw Poly-para-phenylene terephthalamide fibers. It can be spun into kevlar or sold to a trader.
